About CF Fetcher

Fast, efficient, and reliable Codeforces data retrieval.

Our Mission

To provide developers and competitive programmers with a seamless way to access Codeforces problem sets, user statistics, and contest data using the power of Zig and ZX.

Why Zig?

Built with performance in mind, our fetcher utilizes Zig's memory safety and speed to ensure you get your data instantly without overhead.
